name: The Last Flight of the S.S Control
name_original: The Last Flight of the S.S Control
description:
The year is 3089. S.S. stands for spaceship now, and angry geometry is attacking the planet. It is your job to stop them, or die trying.

Battle a ceaseless onslaught of shapes as your ship's speed, weapons and even its controls constantly change. See how far you can get in The Last Flight of the S.S. Control

This game was made in 48 hours as a part of the GMTK Jam with the theme "Out of Control"

Made by MiltonNH25 and Jeremy66
